Turn your TV set ON

Aim your remote at your TV set. Press and hold the number button that has the first alphabet of your TV brand (e.g. Button 7 PQRSfor Sony, Philips, Panasonic, etc TV, Button 5 JKLfor LG, Lloyd, etc) until your TV switches OFF. Once it is o, release the button.

1. Takes 90 seconds to boil 600ml water.

4. Connecting cable is short in length.

But Why is it able for 3 star: my experience

2. With auto shut down feature it becomes more smart the product.
3. Light in weight and portable designed.

Good quality high speed BLDC Fan by Polycab. Impressive speed with remote control features. Fan look very decent at the price range and white colour looks beautiful for living room. I must say, one should go for bldc energy saving fan for daily use. Good air circulation with 6 speed remote control and added advance features make fan even worth buy. Packaging was also good.

1. Speed: Is fast enough. I expected it to be faster.
2. Noise: noisier compared to a Polycab Silencio Mini and a Crompton Energion Cromair that I have in my other rooms.
3. Bill savings: it saves me a considerable amount in electricity bills indeed.
4. Design and looks: Design is premium. The Copper-ish projection on the wings makes it look very premium.
5. Fan start-up and speed-changing is slower than my Crompton Energion Cromair, but as fast as Polycab Silencio Mini.

I bought V-Guard Mini Crystal Voltage Stabilizer from Flipkart, three months earlier. Got delivered in 6 days at my location (NCR). The packaging of product was very good.
Product is really good. No heating and no sound at all. It works on inverter efficiently.
I am using it on Samsung 32" LED TV from past 3 months, running good till date.
I got lot of power fluctuation and power cuts at my place, So I am using it with Belkin Surge protector Cube to save my LED.

It has been a month since I purchased this stabilizer for my 32 inch LED TV. I have also connected the DTH. Works without a hitch!

I haven't experienced low voltage or power fluctuations to see how the stabilizer performs in these conditions.

Flipkart delivery was prompt as usual.

I am using VG min stabilizer since 4 months and its providing good support amidst good voltage fluctuations. So issues found so far and looks go work for few more years to come.

Branded quality stuff from Philips..250W blender with super sharp blades...minimal noise and great quality....

I have extensively used Philips HR 1363 and had found it very convenient and easy to use. Worked very well to make soups and other baby food. However, the HR1350 was a major disappointment. It is actually very difficult to press and operate. Also, the power is too less to even blend well cooked vegetables.

This is a solid product. It function is flawless. But I noticed two lines on each side of its body because of the manufacturing process used. It should not bother you normally but might be helpful info for some. Its made in India.
The best part is how less time you have to spend with it to get your work done. No transferring from one bowl to another and put it in a bowl with water and spin to clean. amazingly quick.

It is economical and value for money. Easy to store as it is dismantalable. Also having an open end, easy to clean. Because the blade is small, it takes a little longer than the conventional mixer/blender, but a super product.

Philips products are always reliable and simple to use and so is this blender. Flipkart delivered it on time as it always does. I am using it till now and no complaints or problems. I do not like the push button that much but hey it's just my perspective. Overall a good product at an amazing price. keep going flipkart.
It works well , easy to use and build quality is worth at such a low price. There are few shortcomings but overall its a good choice.

I Ordered this product on 5 March 2012 And got it on 6 March.The Delivery was excellent and fast and packaging was great to quite hard to open.
About the product- it was a good deal because in that price tag you cannot ask for more.It is a simple and effective product and has nice blades, good for pureeing and making shakes and even grinding.It is very powerful and makes less noise.

Good quality high speed BLDC Fan by Polycab. Impressive speed with remote control features. Fan look very decent at the price range and white colour looks beautiful for living room. I must say, one should go for bldc energy saving fan for daily use. Good air circulation with 6 speed remote control and added advance features make fan even worth buy. Packaging was also good.

1. Speed: Is fast enough. I expected it to be faster.
2. Noise: noisier compared to a Polycab Silencio Mini and a Crompton Energion Cromair that I have in my other rooms.
3. Bill savings: it saves me a considerable amount in electricity bills indeed.
4. Design and looks: Design is premium. The Copper-ish projection on the wings makes it look very premium.
5. Fan start-up and speed-changing is slower than my Crompton Energion Cromair, but as fast as Polycab Silencio Mini.

Good quality high speed BLDC Fan by Polycab. Impressive speed with remote control features. Fan look very decent at the price range and white colour looks beautiful for living room. I must say, one should go for bldc energy saving fan for daily use. Good air circulation with 6 speed remote control and added advance features make fan even worth buy. Packaging was also good.

1. Speed: Is fast enough. I expected it to be faster.
2. Noise: noisier compared to a Polycab Silencio Mini and a Crompton Energion Cromair that I have in my other rooms.
3. Bill savings: it saves me a considerable amount in electricity bills indeed.
4. Design and looks: Design is premium. The Copper-ish projection on the wings makes it look very premium.
5. Fan start-up and speed-changing is slower than my Crompton Energion Cromair, but as fast as Polycab Silencio Mini.
